feedback: The experience with the player was okay. It seams to be a bit outdated, but works fine. Flash is a no-go. You should migrate to newer technologies. Some social media sharing would be great. It's great that one can give feedback!
I guess this will be fixed, but the need to activate flash is not food  I really like the "smart TV" looks. Overall very easy to navigate and find stuff, quite up-to-date and appealing design

Just a remark on the requirement of using Flash, this a a very restritive contraint for displaying the content in a iOS device, i.e, ipad or iphone. Having an app would be a good option to solve this issue.
